titleStmt.title: A declaration of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament for the raising of forces both horse and foot in severall parts of this kingdom to resist, suppresse, subdue and pursue, kill and slay and to put to execution and by all means to destroy such papists and all affected persons who have traiterously combined together, and entred into association and which have already raised great forces both horse and foot in severall counties of this kingdom and have plundered, spoiled and destroyed multitudes of His Maiesties good subjects : together with certain instructions for the lord lieutenants, deputy-lieutenants and other officers and commanders in the counties of Norfolk, Suffolk, Essex, Cambridge, Isle of Ely, Hartford and county of the city of Norwich : as also the resolution and association of the aforesaid counties.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for E. Husbands and I. Frank,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
